abstract: Google is making important changes to Buzz to address criticism from users and privacy advocates.
snippet: Google is making important changes to Buzz to address criticism from users and privacy advocates.
lead_paragraph: Google moved quickly to contain a firestorm of criticism over Buzz, its new social network, taking the unusual step of announcing changes to the product over the weekend to address privacy problems.

headline.main: Google Alters Buzz to Tackle Privacy Flaws
